channel.title: Bugged shops
channel.description:
I have figment 4.5, most of the shops don't work, so i try to add them, and just get this error in return...
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -47 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16606) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15624) at client.packetSending(client.java:15593) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:55) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
every single time, all my players are getting annoied, and im getting frustrated... can some 1 please tell me how to fix this... ='[

item.title: Bugged shops
item.dc:creator: @modbrian modbrian
item.description:
@modbrian wrote:

figment sucks anyway, it doesnt even have ipban so hackers love seeing figment sources online, cuz their so easy to spam and hack.

btw im guessing your new for unless u want to get hacked id change the names under the banuser and getpass commands
